stadium.name: The Buccaneer's Bowl
stadium.description: A flashy, pristine stadium built on a private beach exclusively for resort guests. The field is imported turf, and a massive, puppet kraken in the bay entertains the crowd at halftime.

stats.pregame_ritual: Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Sticking leeches to their legs to 'lighten their step'.
Bribing a local oracle with a meat pie for a vague prophecy.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Painting their teeth with a mixture of charcoal and water.
Doing a series of loud, guttural breathing exercises.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.

Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.

stadium.name: The Stronghold Bailey
stadium.description: The team plays in the central bailey of Stronghold Castle, a massive fortress built on a plateau overlooking the city. The field is packed earth and cobblestone, and the crowd watches from the surrounding stone ramparts.

stats.pregame_ritual: Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Eating a piece of honeycomb to 'sweeten' their victory.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Tugging on their left earlobe three times.
Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Tying a red string around their pinky finger.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è GOOD EVENING, BLOODSPORTS FANS! üéôÔ∏è

It's a beautiful, blindingly bright Tuesday night here in Osterra, and this is **Nok the Corrupter** coming to you live from the **Buccaneer's Bowl**! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è We are at the Toast Island Resort, folks, and let me tell you, the smell of sea salt is almost strong enough to cover the stench of the impending violence! The tourists are distracted, the security is tight, and the sun is beating down on the field like a hammer on an anvil! It is a perfect day for TROLLBALL! üëπüèà

Tonight, we have a clash of cultures! Traveling down from the stone ramparts of the Stronghold, we have the **New Ravenfall Commanders**! üè∞ They are looking disciplined, they are looking heavily armored, and they are looking to smash! I've been watching their warm-ups, and **Jozef Pepe** is already in mid-season form‚ÄîI heard him belching from the commentary booth! That is the sound of a warrior prepared for war! Of course, they are associated with the Eponore faction. You know, folks like **God King Sir Artorias**? I bet Artorias is too busy signing autographs to watch this match. Typical celebrity behavior! üôÑ

And facing them, on their home turf, the **Tortell Privateers**! üèùÔ∏è These Cedar Hill scoundrels are ready to defend their beach! I saw **Dib Tufts** chugging raw eggs‚Äîshells and all‚Äîright before taking the field. That is the kind of psychopathic dedication I respect! They've got the backing of **Elspeth Ortell**, the disintegration dealer herself. Let's hope she didn't accidentally disintegrate the game plan, eh? Ha! üß™

The leather is tough, the weapons are sharp, and my heart is black with anticipation! Let's get down to the violence! ü©∏‚öîÔ∏è
postGame:
# üèÅ POST-GAME CARNAGE REPORT üèÅ

**FINAL SCORE: Tortell Privateers 4 - New Ravenfall Commanders 2**

Wow! What a display! What a magnificent, messy, beautiful display of aggression! The **Tortell Privateers** have defended their sandy fortress and sent the Commanders packing back to their castle with nothing but bruises and a loss! üèÜ

The match started with absolute chaos, just the way I like it! **Castorina Gies** was everywhere early on for the Privateers, scooping up that Troll head and running like a thief in the night! But the real highlight? The sheer number of double-knockouts! üí• We had **Theis Loredo** and **Keisling Damalas** knocking each other into next week almost immediately! It is a beautiful thing when nobody wins a fight! Mutual destruction is the purest form of combat!

The Privateers drew first blood on the scoreboard, though! **Castorina Gies** found a lane and fired a shot from Away Field‚ÄîBAM! Two points! üéØ The Commanders looked stunned. They were reeling! And before they could recover, **Ellan Elburt** launched another shot from Center Field to make it **4-0**! The Commanders' defense was looking about as useful as **Governor-King Zenku**'s face cream! 

We saw some classic brutality in the trenches. **Dusa Curson** and **Loralee Sunny**? Both unconscious! **Goldberg Tova** and **Fleme Alis**? Both counting sheep! üí§ The healers, **Hooge Imtiaz** and **Eugen Zacks**, were the hardest working people on the pitch today! They were patching up limbs faster than **Sir Garon Ironrock** opens doors!

Halftime came and went, and the Commanders finally woke up! üîî In the second half, **Croteau Osmo** managed to slip through the defense and fire a rocket from Home Field to put Ravenfall on the board! **4-2**! I thought we were in for a comeback! I was ready to see the Privateers crumble like a stale cookie!

But oh, the fumble-fest that followed! ü§£ It was a comedy of errors! **Loralee Sunny** dropped it. **Rhett Gavrilla** dropped it. **Dusa Curson** missed a shot and dropped it. It was slippery out there! Maybe **Imra** spilled some of his "elixirs" on the ball? It was chaos! Absolute butterfingers all around!

In the end, the Privateers held on. **Dib Tufts** made a crucial steal, and **Castorina Gies** controlled the clock as the time ticked down. The Commanders fought hard‚Äî**Jozef Pepe** absolutely flattened **Kidder Starkey** with that Zweihander‚Äîbut it wasn't enough to close the gap.

So, the **Tortell Privateers** take the win! The Commanders go home to cry on **Morgwae's** shoulder. A fantastic night of broken bones and shattered dreams! This is **Nok the Corrupter**, reminding you to keep your head up, or someone will knock it off! Goodnight, Osterra! üåôüòà
